2.Write a HTML program for adding images

Back

Here is the following code for html save the file as .html

<!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>Image Adding</title> </head> <body> <h1 align="center">Image Adding Using HTML</h1> <h2>Displaying the Image in different ways</h2> <h2>1.vertical</h2> <h2>2.Horizontal</h2> <h2>3.Resizeing</h2> <h3>1.Displaying the images in sequence vertically</h3> <img src="../images/1.jpg"> <img src="../images/2.jpg"> <img src="../images/3.jpg"> <h3>2.Displaying the images in sequence Horizontally</h3> <img src="../images/1.jpg"></br> <img src="../images/2.jpg"></br> <img src="../images/3.jpg"></br> <h3>3.Changing the the display size of the images</h3> <img src="../images/1.jpg" height="100%" width="100%"> <img src="../images/2.jpg" height="100%" width="100%"> <img src="../images/3.jpg" height="100%" width="100%"> </body> </html>

Want to check the output click the output option or click the back option to go to home page
